post.content:
Hi everybody. I have suggestion to have series of workshop. It has been 19 years since I had graduated from the school. When I was in school, I was busy studying (????) plus I had a lot of discussion among friends about future, life, sex, friendship, money and etc.
Since then I have been busy surviving not living. I will reassess my life, goal and age old questions during holiday season. I will be home most of time due to new born.
If there are enough persons to reassess the similar interests, I like to have the opportunity to discuss in coming year.
Agenda ======= - What is the life and what is the meaning of life in lighter side ? - How to raise our kids ? - Marriage : What the heck is it ? - Future of Community one - What are we doing here in Canada ? - Career advancement
I know every single one of them is very heavy subjects itself. However I like to discuss in lighter side.
Initially I like to discuss "WHAT and "WHY". There will be chance to discuss "HOW" latter days.
If you like the concept, please put your name down at below. Format could be one topic for one session and roundtable. Participants will have time limit to speak. Thus eveybody can participate.
Names ====== Thomas Lee Scott Lee Spencer Hwang
